definition: to mention/to raise (a subject)/to bring to sb's attention
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
and/to reach/up to/in time for
not mentioned

sentences.english: Highs: a wise decision in finding a good wife and a business that was doing quite well.
sentences.chinese: 成功的部分則會提及找到一個好太太和職場上的成功。

sentences.english: The president also harked back to ancient Sinhalese martial heroes.
sentences.chinese: 總統又提及古代僧伽羅戰爭英雄。

sentences.english: But most people think of chemistry as involving reactions.
sentences.chinese: 但是更多的人一想到化學，就會提及到反應。

sentences.english: These refer to the last days when the kingdom of God will be set up on earth.
sentences.chinese: 這些提及的最後幾天時，上帝的王國將成立地球上。

sentences.english: Follow this up with a succinct description of the location followed by a dash and a time reference.
sentences.chinese: 接着，簡要地說明地點，然後用一個破折號提及時間。

sentences.english: He did not mention it even in the bosom of his family.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至在自家人中也未提及此事。

sentences.english: In the works of Confucius, afterlife, ghost and deity were seldom mentioned.
sentences.chinese: 在孔子的著作中很少提及來世和鬼神。

sentences.english: The president also harked back to ancient Sinhalese martial heroes.
sentences.chinese: 總統先生還提及了古時的幸哈族戰爭英雄。

sentences.english: Or they could be related by all referring to, whats your name?
sentences.chinese: 或者他們有互相提及的關係，你叫什麼？

sentences.english: The foreign ministry refers not to the women, but to “the issue known as ‘wartime comfort women’”.
sentences.chinese: 日本外交部從不提及個別女性，只稱“戰時慰安婦”。

sentences.english: This is to acknowledge receipt of your letter regarding the above-captioned matter.
sentences.chinese: 確認收到您關於提及上述事件的來函。

sentences.english: You mentioned the braces were larger than they ought to be.
sentences.chinese: 你曾提及到這些力木比它應該的樣子還大。

sentences.english: He slipped a mention about my abilities into his talk.
sentences.chinese: 他在談話中巧妙地提及了一下我的才能。

sentences.english: ShenXing to Amy mentioned Chen research.
sentences.chinese: 沈星向艾米提及了陳研。

sentences.english: The following exchange types are mentioned in the specification.
sentences.chinese: 下列交換器類型都在規範中被提及。

sentences.english: This order was awarded under a five-year contract originally signed in 2005.
sentences.chinese: 訂單早在2005年簽署的五年合約中提及。

definition: to mention/to raise (a subject)/to refer to
to discuss/to talk about
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
pertaining to/concerning/with regard to/about/a matter of
to talk about/to mention
to refer to/to speak about/to talk about
to talk about/to mention/(preposition) as for
to mention/to speak of/to lift/to pick up/to arouse/to raise (a topic, a heavy weight, one's fist, one's spirits etc)
to formulate/enunciation/to explain sth precisely
to emphasize (a statement)/to stress
to know/to understand
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
to recount
to discuss/to talk over/CL:個|个[ge4]
to declare to be untrue/to deny
to talk about sth
